<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2409</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acceleration and velocity of a moving body down a slope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung und Geschwindigkeit eines 
beweglichen Körpers hinunter eine Steigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Accélération et vitesse d'un corps mobile en 
bas d'une pente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acceleration e velocidade de um corpo movente 
abaixo uma inclinação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accelerazione e velocità di un corpo commovente 
giù un pendio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα και ταχύτητα ενός κινούμενου σώματος κάτω 
από μια κλίση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceleración y velocidad de un cuerpo móvil 
abajo de una cuesta</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Simulation which demonstrates the movment of an object down a slope at the end of which is a spring. The slope can be changed and the changes in velocity and acceleration observed on a graph.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation, die das movment einer Nachricht 
hinunter eine Steigung am Ende zeigt, von dem ein Frühling ist. 
Die Steigung kann geändert werden und die Änderungen in der 
Geschwindigkeit und in der Beschleunigung auf einem Diagramm 
beobachtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation qui démontre le movment d'un 
objet en bas d'une pente à l'extrémité de laquelle est un ressort. 
On peut être changé et les changements de la vitesse et de 
l'accélération observer la pente sur un graphique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação que demonstre o movment de um 
objeto abaixo uma inclinação na extremidade de que é uma mola. 
A inclinação pode ser mudada e as mudanças na velocidade e no
acceleration ser observada em um gráfico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione che dimostra il movment di un 
oggetto giù un pendio all'estremità di cui è una molla. Il 
pendio può essere cambiato ed i cambiamenti nella velocità e 
nell'accelerazione essere osservato su un grafico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση που καταδεικνύει το movment ενός 
αντικειμένου κάτω από μια κλίση στο τέλος της οποίας είναι ένα
ελατήριο. Την κλίση μπορεί να αλλάξουν και οι αλλαγές στην 
ταχύτητα και την ταχύτητα παρατηρηθείς σε μια γραφική παράσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación que demuestra el movment de un 
objeto abajo de una cuesta en el extremo de el cual está un resorte. 
La cuesta se puede ser cambiada y los cambios en velocidad y la 
aceleración observar en un gráfico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">slpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
